faq.question: What is the most popular product?
faq.answer: Our most popular tea is Uji Matcha, a vibrant green tea powder from Japan known for its rich flavor and numerous health benefits. Customers love its smooth, umami taste and energizing properties.

faq.question: What tea would you suggest for the health benefits?
faq.answer: Green Tea is highly recommended for its antioxidant properties and numerous health benefits, including improved metabolism and heart health.

faq.question: What types of tea do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer a variety of teas including black, green, white, and oolong. Each type has its own unique flavor profile and health benefits.

faq.question: Can I return or exchange tea products?
faq.answer: We accept returns or exchanges on unopened tea products within 30 days of purchase with a receipt. Unfortunately, we cannot accept returns on opened tea products unless there is a quality issue.

faq.question: How long do your teas last?
faq.answer: Properly stored tea can last for several months to years, depending on the type. Generally, black teas have a longer shelf life than green or white teas. For the best flavor, consume your tea within 6-12 months.
